title: Mystery Inc. Bookstore
short_desc: A bookstore made with the MERN stack. Senior group project from College
full_desc: This is an e-commerce project made using the MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, and NodeJS) tech stack. It is a mystery themed online bookstore that features JSON Web Token authentication written from scratch and persistent cart tracking for signed in users. It also features a search function and admin dashboard. Payments are handled via Stripe integration using the test mode.

title: Destiny Mod Checker
short_desc: A Discord Bot used to track merchants inside of the game Destiny 2.

title: Bank Tracker
short_desc: Application that uploads a bank CSV to Google Sheets with formatting.
